ItemRandoSelector.name: Shops & Moves
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip:
Cranky, Funky, and Candy Moves are in the Pool and become possible locations for items.
By selecting this, Cross-Kong purchases is forced on.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Camera & Shockwave
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Camera and Shockwave may not necessarily be the Fairy Queen's gift.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Tough Golden Bananas
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip:
Tougher Golden Banana checks will be in the pool:
- All 3 Minecart Rides
- Both Beetle Races
- Fungi and Caves Baboon Blasts
- Rabbit, Owl, Vulture and Seal Races
- Arcade Round 1
- Rareware Golden Banana

ItemRandoSelector.name: Battle Crowns
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Crowns are in the Pool and Battle Arenas become possible locations for items.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Blueprints
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Blueprints are in the Pool and Kasplats become possible locations for items.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Keys
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Keys are in the Pool and Bosses become possible locations for items.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Banana Medals
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip:
Medals are in the Pool and Collecting the required amount of Colored Bananas
for a Banana Medal can reward items.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Nintendo Coin
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Nintendo Coin are in the Pool and DK Arcade becomes a possible location for items.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Rareware Coin
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Rareware Coin are in the Pool and Jetpac become a possible location for items.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Kongs
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Kongs are in the Pool but are not replaced with an item currently.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Fairies
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Fairies are in the Pool and Items in their place can be captured with a camera.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Rainbow Coins
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Rainbow Coins are in the Pool and Dirt Patches become possible locations for items.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Miscellaneous Items
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip:
The 5 Pearls and the Bean are in the Pool
Tiny's Anthill and Treasure Chest become possible locations for items.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Ice Traps
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: If you pick up a fake item it'll hurt and freeze you.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Junk Items
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Pointless items will fill no-item slots.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Melon Crates
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Melon Crates become possible locations for items.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Shop Owners
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Shop Owner Items are added into the pool.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Hints
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Hints and Wrinkly Doors are in the pool.
